welcome_message:
Welcome to the DBX Fullstack Boilerplate template!

This template creates a modern fullstack application with:
- Next.js 16 frontend with React 19 and Tailwind CSS
- FastAPI backend with Python 3.10+
- pnpm workspaces and Turborepo for monorepo management
- Production-ready deployment on Databricks Apps

project_name.description: Unique name for this project (lowercase, numbers, and hyphens only)
project_name.pattern_match_failure_message: Project name must consist of lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens only.

success_message:
Your fullstack bundle '{{.project_name}}' has been created!

Next steps:
  1. cd {{.project_name}}
  2. ./scripts/setup.sh     # Install dependencies
  3. ./scripts/dev.sh       # Start development servers
  4. databricks bundle deploy  # Deploy to Databricks
